Play:
The Love of Ohan and Choemon
(Katsuragawa renri no shigarami / 桂川連理柵)

Written By: Suga Sensuke (菅専助)

First Staged: 1776

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 168, September 1979; Bunraku March 1976, November 1985 Performance Programs

– Click image to view.

Performances:

October 1968: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

October 1970: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

July 1972: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

January 1974: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

March 1976: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

July 1977 Asahiza: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

September 1979: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

July 1981: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

November 1985: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

March 1989: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

December 1989 : The Love of Ohan and Choemon

January 1994: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

December 1994: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

September 1997: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

Characters:

Chokichi (Decchi Chōkichi / 丁稚長吉)

Ohan (Musume Ohan / 娘お半)

Rin (Gejo Rin / 下女りん)

Choemon (Obiya Chōemon / 帯屋長右衛門)

Proprietor of the inn (Yadoya teishu / 宿屋亭主)

Maid at the debaya inn (Debaya no jochū / 出刃屋の女中)

Okinu (Nyōbō Okinu / 女房お絹)

Gihei (Otōto Gihei / 弟儀兵衛)

Otose (Haha Otose / 母おとせ)

Hansai (Oya Hansai / 親繁斎)

Servants (Genan / 下男)
